attributes.action: take immediate action to stop the downgrading of services at Ipswich Hospital, Suffolk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ipswich Hospital needs to be kept as a modern and thriving centre of excellence, the public need Ipswich Hospital to remain    available to them and this means providing full services, and giving our consultants the support they need to serve the wider community.  The public in this area of the country are frequently ignored for raising real concerns regarding lack of access to services and our medical teams must be supported and heard.Stop taking vital services away, it is not cost effective and it is downright dangerous!
